sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1107936_cconnect.CConnectNowInt</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>CConnectNowInt</name><script><![CDATA[var CConnectNowInt = Class.create();
CConnectNowInt.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},
    getAttachment: function(tableSysId) {
        var attachmentGr = new GlideRecord('sys_attachment');
        attachmentGr.addEncodedQuery('table_sys_id='+tableSysId);
        attachmentGr.query();
        if (attachmentGr.next()) {
			var fileContent = '';
            var is = new GlideSysAttachment().getContentStream(attachmentGr.sys_id);
            var reader = new GlideTextReader(is);
            var ln = ' ';
            while ((ln = reader.readLine()) != null) {
                fileContent += ln + '\n';
            }
            return fileContent;

        } else {
            return 'Attachment not found: ' + tableSysId;
        }
    },
	convertJSONtoObject: function(fileContent) {
        var obj = JSON.parse(fileContent);
		return obj;
    },
    type: 'CConnectNowInt'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-07-02 04:21:49</sys_created_on><sys_id>8acfae0b474b4210dc849530116d432b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CConnectNowInt</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CConnectnow Integration" source="x_1107936_cconnect">e9009b7e47c70210dc849530116d43c9</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="CConnectnow Integration">e9009b7e47c70210dc849530116d43c9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8acfae0b474b4210dc849530116d432b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-07-02 04:40:50</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
